review: Dr Shankar was very friendly and listened to my needs and explained what was needed clearly. The nurses were kind and capable and the clinic is clean and all staff were efficient.

Dr. Priti is very professional and well spoken. I went to the doctor for chicken pox, she treated me really well, told me home remedies to cure and prescribed medicines which were really required. She listens to all your problems and enquires health history, she was also available on whatsp for any queries . I would highly recommend Dr.Priti.
